allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
checkpoint: Implement Phase 1 MVP of tfbreak - Terraform breaking change detector

Complete implementation of CR-0001 Phase 1 MVP including:

Core Types \(internal/types/\):
- Severity enum \(BREAKING, RISKY, INFO\) with JSON marshaling
- ModuleSnapshot and signature types \(Variable, Output, Resource, ModuleCall, MovedBlock\)
- Finding and CheckResult types for rule evaluation results

Loader Package \(internal/loader/\):
- Load Terraform modules using hashicorp/terraform-config-inspect
- Extract variables, outputs, resources, and module calls
- Parse moved blocks using HCL/v2 directly \(not supported by terraform-config-inspect\)

Rules Package \(internal/rules/\):
- Rule interface and registry pattern
- Rule engine for evaluating all enabled rules
- 9 rules implemented: BC001, BC002, BC005, RC006, BC009, BC100, BC101, BC102, BC103

Output Package \(internal/output/\):
- Renderer interface with text and JSON implementations
- Color support for terminal output

CLI Package \(internal/cli/\):
- check command: compare old/new directories and report findings
- version command: print version information
- Flags: --format, --fail-on, --color, --output, --quiet, --verbose

Test Suite:
- 54 unit tests covering all packages
- 10 fixture-based integration test scenarios
- Test fixtures in testdata/scenarios/ and testdata/loader/

Build System:
- Makefile with build, test, lint, clean, coverage targets
- go.mod with dependencies \(cobra, terraform-config-inspect, hcl/v2, color\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
